author: VNExplorer
title: Amazon knocks £160 off Ninja Woodfire BBQ perfect for England Euros party
text: The Euros 2024 final is around the corner and the Three Lions will meet Spain on Sunday evening, with the weather forecast looking bright, football fans can hopefully look forward to enjoying a glorious weekend with a barbecue party. Amazon has offered limited-time Ninja deals to barbie fans who are looking to upgrade their grills and BBQ set. It's the Ninja Woodfire Electric BBQ Grill & Smoker, a 7-in-1 non-stick outdoor grill and airfryer. Shoppers can save 40% and get this fuss-free outdoor cooker for £238 instead of £399.99, it's so good that even David Beckham used it to grill mushrooms for his homemade pizza. The Ninja Website is selling it for £249.99 but you can get a free cover and an adjustable stand. Food lovers will appreciate the grill & smoker as the integrated smoker box burns "100% real wood pellets for natural woodfire flavours". You can fit up to 16 sausages or two racks of spare ribs and let it cook in low heat for tender results; or you can smoke them quickly to add flavours. The 7-in-1 grill and smoker are perfect if you are craving for steaks, hot dogs or fried chicken But customers were impressed when they found out the Ninja Woodfire Grill & Smoker can also be used as an air fryer. One fan shared: "I air fried some chicken wings, perfect and also did some pork chops on the grill as well. It's never stopped since I got it!" Another five-star user called it a "game changer for outdoor cooking" and he said: "I was sceptical about whether an outdoor electric appliance could replace my regular barbecue grill, which I loved using for high quality Brazilian and Argentinian cuts with delicious fat. "The best part is that I haven't even used the pellets and smoke function yet, as the meat tastes just like it was made on a charcoal grill." And one happy husband shared: "I have BBQ-ed for many years and my wife purchased this for me as a 25-year anniversary present. It's fantastic to use and great fun, leaves no mess and very versatile. I love it." You can save £160 and grill it like Beckham Powered by electricity, the Woodfire Electric BBQ Grill & Smoker is quick to heat up and costs from roughly 41p per session. The weather-resistant material means you don't have to store it in the house or the shed and it's perfect to use in gardens and on patios. Looking for a powerful BBQ grill? John Lewis offers a Grillstream 3 Burner Hybrid Gas and Charcoal BBQ and it has 16 glowing 5-star reviews online. Chefree's Health Grill and Air Fryer is a budget option to the Ninja Woodfire, it's also on a limited time deal and it's been reduced from £109.99 to £75.99.

organizations.name: ninja woodfire electric bbq grill & smoker

author: Tiempo - La Noticia Digital.
title: 9 incendios forestales en Chihuahua; afecta 25 mil hectáreas: CONAFOR
text:
Según el corte realizado a las 17:00 horas de este miércoles, se cuenta con 294 elementos combatiendo los siniestros, mientras que dos incendios ya fueron liquidados tras consumir 36 hectáreas.
De los incendios activos, dos se desarrollan dentro de Áreas Naturales Protegidas. El municipio de Madera registra dos conflagraciones significativas, con más de 9,700 hectáreas afectadas combinadamente, mientras que en Bocoyna se logró controlar un incendio de gran magnitud que arrasó con 9,708 hectáreas.
Las autoridades han logrado contener al 100% los incendios en Bocoyna y Guerrero. No obstante, en municipios como Moris y Balleza, el fuego sigue fuera de control en algunas zonas, lo que ha elevado la atención de los cuerpos de emergencia.
La cifra de incendios acumulados en lo que va del 2025 asciende a 379, con una superficie preliminar afectada total de 82,302.47 hectáreas.
CONAFOR reiteró el llamado a la población a evitar el uso de fuego en zonas forestales y reportar de inmediato cualquier columna de humo al 800 737 0000 o al 911.
Detalle de incendios:

author: @ukrinform
title: Ukraine will be able to win war with help of allies - Estonian diplomat
text: Ukraine will be able to win war with help of allies - Estonian diplomat That's according to [ERR](https://rus.err.ee/1609331216/maazikas-s-pomowju-sojuznikov-ukraina-smozhet-vernut-krym-i-vse-okkupirovannye-territorii), Ukrinform reports. According to Maasikas, it is up to the people and Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky to decide which agreement will end the war. "They will decide whether they have achieved their goals. Our task is to help them. From the beginning of March 2022, it was clear that with the weapons and forces that Russia has deployed at the moment, it will not be able to win this war. Our duty is to help Ukraine win the war," Maasikas said. According to his assessment, Ukraine will be able to return Crimea and all other territories occupied by the Russians. "If we help them, it [Ukraine] will be able [to defeat Russia] with the help of allies. The third year of the war is going on, and it's no secret that war fatigue has set in, but 90% of Ukrainians are still against any territorial concessions," the diplomat said. He noted that if the war enters a static phase, then the side with a technological advantage will have the greatest chance of victory. "We, the Western allies of Ukraine, have the technologies that are also transferred to Ukraine," he added. According to Maasikas, Ukraine will hold on as long as its citizens have the will to defend themselves and the weapons to fight. "So far we have both. However, more weapons may be found," he said. Maasikas served as head of the EU Delegation to Ukraine from September 2019 to September 2023.
